title: How to Make Pine Nuts Pasta

steps.headline: Boil a large pot of salted water.
Mix the tomatoes, oil, and garlic in a medium-sized bowl.
Add a desired amount of salt and pepper.
Have the mixture stay at room temperature for about 10 minutes.
Boil the pasta for about 7-8 minutes, until the pasta is soft but slightly tender.
Drain the pasta into a colander and return back to the pot.
Fold in the tomato mixture and slowly combine with a wooden spoon until well-tossed.
Add the pine nuts into the pasta.
Serve.
steps.description: Place a desired amount of pasta in a serving bowl. Garnish with extra pine nuts if desired. Enjoy!

text: Boil a large pot of salted water.  Mix the tomatoes, oil, and garlic in a medium-sized bowl. Stir with a wooden spoon. Add a desired amount of salt and pepper. Mix again. Have the mixture stay at room temperature for about 10 minutes.  Boil the pasta for about 7-8 minutes, until the pasta is soft but slightly tender.  Drain the pasta into a colander and return back to the pot.  Fold in the tomato mixture and slowly combine with a wooden spoon until well-tossed.  Add the pine nuts into the pasta. Mix again. Serve. Place a desired amount of pasta in a serving bowl. Garnish with extra pine nuts if desired. Enjoy!
